text: Ellen Gunilla Margareta Pontén (14 June 1929 – 29 June 2019) was a Swedish fashion designer. She was born in Stockholm. Pontén designed clothes with the base colours of grey, white or black. In 1983, she was awarded the Damernas Värld design award Guldknappen, in 2003 she was awarded a Litteris et Artibus In 2008, she was awarded the KTH Great Prize. Pontén died on 29 June 2019, in Stockholm at the age of 90. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Fashion designers Category:People from Stockholm Category:Swedish designers Category:20th-century artists
title: Gunilla Pontén
